attributes.action: review the exorbitant fee for spouse visa under current credit crunch.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in the current recession days where 100 years old businesses are closing down, banks cutting down on their interest rates,unemployment hitting decades high, we request the prime minister to review the fees for indefinite leave to remain for spouse visa which is currently 750 pounds and person like me who is paying all the taxes- the income tax, national insurance, the council tax, and also is a father of one finds it exorbitant and feels as government is doing all it can to support banks and cutting down on vat bringing prices down should also look into and cut it down to at least half if can't fully abolish it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
